title.rendered: Test Drive a Bus Day on November 19

content.rendered:
The district will host Test Drive a Bus Day on Saturday, November 19 from 10 a.m. to 1 p.m.   The community is invited to attend this family-friendly event at Maple Avenue Middle School.

At the event, you can test drive a school bus, talk with school bus drivers, and learn about transportation department employment opportunities.  In addition, there will be refreshments provided by CSEA Unit 8456, Blue Streak giveaways, as well as bus tours and safety information.

Please call the transportation department at 518-587-4545 with questions.
